section.title: Technical data
section.p: Speller tool: Hunspell, command line version

(unflagged spelling errors):
0

tokenized spelling errors:
0

Number of false positives
(incorrectly flagged words):
15

Number of true negatives
(unflagged correct words):
615

Number of errouneously
tokenized correct words:
6

ul.li: Number of spelling errors with correct suggestion: 0
Number of spelling errors with correct suggestion in top 5: 0
Number of spelling errors with only wrong suggestions: 0
Number of spelling errors with no suggestions at all: 0
Number of spelling errors with editing distance 2: 0
Number of spelling errors with editing distance 3 or more: 0

section.title: True negatives (615)
section.p: The correctly accepted words are listed here for easy copy&paste into Word to quick check regressions in new versions of the speller: No correctly spelled words accepted by an earlier speller should be rejected by later spellers. To check, just copy and paste these words to Word, and see if you get any red underlines. Duplicate words are not repeated, unless one is followed by some punctuation. The words are reverse sorted according to Unicode character code.
